resources.string: SART is a whole new way to represent and make report of your activity. The acronym stands for STUDENT ACTIVITY REPORTING TOOL and is developed by the team ALPHABEST of LADOKE AKINTOLA UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY STUDENT BRANCH, consisting of Ismail Olalekan, Adebisi Josiah and Raji Mujahid. Here comes a new experience in event reporting with a more user friendly approach. With it simple cataloging each data in your event will be easily reported in a single sheet and in simplest form to the appropriate office and will be processed thereafter. So go ahead with your reporting without any delay and ensure to provide necessary informations. Meanwhile, it will be better to use this tool to make report before and after the event. Reporting before the event will assist you to get assistance through the appropriate channel and reporting after the event will help get your event published and also prove that the event was done as planned. We wish you safe use and remember to like our page on facebook- facebook.com/sart
